name: Curious Line
description:
Welcome to the Curious Line.

This is a line game but this time with a new style. You can twist tactfully generated world while avoiding the black shapes but there are many friendly red and greens ---- be careful as they sometimes come in the way!

How to play:
It is very easy to play just touch anywhere in the screen and drag right or left to move the ball while being save from black shapes if you touch the character will be destroyed and game will be over however,you can touch red and yellows as they are friends.
